title: New Ashe pressed Q and I died in two hits.
body:
Riot pls nerf.
.
.
.
Just thought I would get ahead of the pack and put this out there.
It does look hilariously dumb once you approach a reasonable amount of items.

Edit: Also Riot or anyone who knows, how does Frenzy from the Masteries (5% bonus AS per crit up to 3 times) now work with Ashe?
